title: Using the Quotient Rule for Logarithms
Using the Product Rule for Logarithms
speech: Using the product rule,  the natural log of, parentheses, x squared y cubed,  minus, the natural log of, parentheses z to the fourth  is equal to the natural log of, parentheses x squared  plus, the natural log of, parentheses y cubed  minus, the natural log of, parentheses z to the fourth
pacedSpeech: Using the product rule,  this expression

title: Using the Power Rule
speech: Using the power rule,  the natural log of, parentheses x squared  plus, the natural log of, parentheses y cubed  minus, the natural log of, parentheses z to the fourth  is equal to 2 the natural log of, x, plus, 3 the natural log of, y, minus, 4 the natural log of, z
pacedSpeech: Using the power rule,  this expression
